text: Another Phase is Maria Mena's debut album, which was released by Sony Music Norway. It reached #6 on the Norwegian charts. Her two singles "Free" and "My Lullaby" first appeared on this album. The album was co-written and produced by Arvid Solvang. The original 2002 release was issued in a standard CD jewelcase. The 2009 re-release came in a slider box. ==Track listing== ==Certifications== #Norway: Platinum (30,000+) #"My Lullaby": Gold (NOR) (5,000+) ==External links== * Album information from cdon * Maria Mena's Official Website Category:Maria Mena albums Category:2002 debut albums
title: Another Phase
